General.Name: Hoffmann Green Cement Technologies
General.Description: Hoffmann Green Cement Technologies Societe anonyme designs, produces, distributes, and markets low carbon cements. The company also offers concrete solutions. Hoffmann Green Cement Technologies Societe anonyme was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Vendée, France.
General.Address: 6 rue de La Bretaudière, Rives de l'Yon, France, 85310

0.Title: Co-Founder, Pres, CEO & Chairman of Management Board
